QueryResult.text: SELECT L.ID, L.LOOKUP_TYPE, L.LOOKUP_CODE, L.PARENT_LOOKUP_CODE, L.LOOKUP_LEVEL, L.LOOKUP_ENUM, L.SORT_ORDER, L.IS_SYSTEM, L.IS_ACTIVE, L.IS_ADMIN_VISIBLE, L.IS_UPGRADE_PROTECTED, L.PARTITION_CODE, L.PARTITION_MODE_CODE, L.CREATED_DATE, L.CREATED_BY, L.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, L.LAST_UPDATED_BY, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, NLS.NAME, NLS.DESCRIPTION FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_LOOKUPS L WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_LOOKUPS' AND NLS.PK_ID = L.ID
